News

The schedule of nurses in the holidays is known

Medicine
Today, 10:30.
347
In the Government of Kirov province, it was reported that clinics and hospitals in the region would continue to receive patients over the weekend, and emergency medical services would be available 24 hours a day.

The guests of the Kyrov oblast at the Rossia Exhibition make a dry shower kit for SVS fighters

Society
Today, 3:00.
95
All kits collected will be sent to the military on 4 March

In Kirovo-Cepec district, Russia ' s original ski race began

Sport
Today, 14:30.
154
Air 22.02.2024 at 21.05 (video)
All Russian launches began in Kirovo-Cepec district. Within the framework of Russia ' s initial skiing races, young men and boys in 19 and 20 years have found the strongest in the short distance.

The Kirov province bomber stopped the saboteurs.

Society
Today, 14:01
841
In the Government of the region, with reference to the Molniya information leaflet, two more quotations of heroism were reported. According to the publication, our landlord, the ephreitor Nikolai Jermakov, has repeatedly shown courage and courage in carrying out combat tasks.

Space smoke toy became the winner of the international competition

Culture
Today, 1:30.
121
Air 22.02.2024 at 21.05 (video)
The " Cosmic History in the Smoke Games " project of the Museum of Tsyolkovsky, Aviation and Astronautics was the winner of the international tourism competition "PROBrand " .

Nearly 200 medals were brought by rusty ears from the original PFI

Sport
Today, 13:02
130
In March, our ear masters will represent the Kirov region at the Russian championship.

In Kirov, the Day of the Father ' s Advocate was celebrated.

Society
Today, 12:30.
188
Air 22.02.2024 at 21.05 (video)
In the run-up to the Father ' s Day, ceremonies were held in Kirov. Today is a special occasion.

State and regional awards were awarded to Kirov fighters and their parents

Society
Today, 12:01
300
Governor Alexander Sokolov participated in a ceremony in the Vita Philharmonia. He gave public awards and awards to Kirov province.

Tatiana Golikova identified the Kirov region as a leader in the long-term care system

Medicine
Today, 11:30.
193
Air 22.02.2024 at 21.05 (video)
The Vice-Prime of the Government of Russia, Tatiana Golikova, identified the Kirov region as a leader in the implementation of a long-term care system. The experience of our region has been faded today at a video conference with the leadership of the country.

In Kirov, a solemn ceremony was held to place flowers on the Memorial “Eternal Fire”

Society
Today, 10:59
203
Today, the Governor of Kirov, Alexander Sokolov, the head of the city of Kirov, Elena Kovalev, the head of the administration of Viacheslav Simakov, the deputies of the Kirova City Duma, came to honour all the Fatherlands and pay tribute to the heroes who died in defending the independence of their homeland.

The Plenipotentiary Representative of the President of Russia to the PFI congratulated the inhabitants of the District on the Day of Defence of the Fatherland.

Society
Today, 10:10
159
Half-Paul wished all the protectors of the Father of Health and Welfare.

In February, 21 young Kirk families will receive housing certificates

Society
Today, 09:40
291
This week, the head of the Kirova Viacheslav Simak Administration gave evidence to the first two young families.

Kirovchan is invited to the Space Centre for free screening.

Culture
Today, 9:21
257
The first military film for the spherical surfaces of the Stalingrad Bessmeral Vision will appear under the dome of the Kirov planetary

The Governor of Kirov province congratulated the residents of the region on the Day of Defence of the Father.

Society
Today, 09:01
196
Alexander Sokolov wished for all health, fortitude and victory in the name of our country.

8 647
This fish can contain describers, parasites that hit human liver.

The GTRK Collect, Vitka, congratulates the priests on Father's Day!

Today, 07:02

The doctor called the amount of meat to eat in a day.

Medicine
Today, 06:00.
3 425
According to the specialist, a man can get enough protein from animal products. However, it is better that the proportion of proteins of animal origin in the daily diet is 50 per cent.
